channel.title: PouchDB
channel.description: PouchDB, the JavaScript Database that Syncs!

item.title: PouchDB 5.2.0: A better build system with Rollup
item.dc:creator: Nolan Lawson
item.description: "Rollup! Rollup for the mystery tour!" - Lennon and McCartney

item.title: PouchDB 5.1.0 - Cover all the things
item.dc:creator: Dale Harvey
item.description: It is time for the regularly scheduled PouchDB release, this month has a nice set of improvements, and we even managed to remove a little (3KB) around the edges.

item.title: PouchDB 5.0.0 - Five years of PouchDB
item.dc:creator: Nolan Lawson
item.description: Fitting with the fact that PouchDB turned five years old this year, we're proud to announce PouchDB 5.0.0. This release contains the usual number of bugfixes and improvements, as well as several deprecations, since it is a major version bump.

item.title: PouchDB 4.0.2 - A Little Extra
item.dc:creator: Nolan Lawson
item.description: 4.0.2 is a quick update to sneak in some important bugfixes in anticipation of the next monthly release.

item.title: PouchDB 4.0.1 - Gotta Go Fast
item.dc:creator: Nolan Lawson
item.description: I'm a big fan of classic video games. So when I hack on PouchDB, my inspiration is this guy:

item.title: PouchDB 4.0.0 - Ballast Overboard
item.dc:creator: Dale Harvey
item.description: When discussing what features we should add, we should also discuss what to remove. - possibly Joe Armstrong

item.title: PouchDB 3.6.0
item.dc:creator: Nolan Lawson
item.description: PouchDB 3.6.0 is a monthly release containing several bugfixes, most notably for "retry" replication and attachment replication. It also contains one minor new feature.

item.title: We have a problem with promises
item.dc:creator: Nolan Lawson
item.description: Fellow JavaScripters, it's time to admit it: we have a problem with promises.

item.title: PouchDB 3.5.0: Vote for PouchDB
item.dc:creator: Dale Harvey
item.description: Do you support better documentation for PouchDB users? Do you value faster CORS and better Service Worker support? If so, then today you should cast your vote in support of PouchDB. Together, we can make a better future (release of PouchDB).

item.title: PouchDB 3.4.0: Better late than never
item.dc:creator: Dale Harvey
item.description: Everyone needs a break, and for March PouchDB relaxed and enjoyed the arrival of spring. However, regularly scheduled programming has resumed, and today I am happy to announce PouchDB 3.4.0.
